channel.title: Help on making a teleport command
channel.description:
Hey guys i need help making a teleport command for my source like say ::armadyl to tele you to kree'arra Post here if you know how to thanks
coocoobanana(mercury)

item.title: Help on making a teleport command
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

if(command[0].equals("armadyl")) {
    player.teleToX = XXXX;
    player.teleToY = YYYY;
}

BAsically that, just change the variable to fit your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Help on making a teleport command

item.title: Help on making a teleport command
item.dc:creator: @coocoobanana coocoobanana
item.description:
@coocoobanana wrote:

yes but i dont want a teleblock on it :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2009, 03:48:55 pm[/size][hr]appreciate if you could send a code for like command then a place for coords because i have no idea how to do it sorry guys im new to programmign although not to websites and stuff

Read full topic
item.source: Help on making a teleport command

item.title: Help on making a teleport command
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“r0ckstar96, post:2, topic:301267”]you need the case ID too.
For example,

[quote]
case 168:
if (teleblock == true) { // Enjoy
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
} else {
customCommand(“COMMAND HERE”);
}
break;
[/quote][/quote]

You don’t need a case for a string command. Just make a new command called armadyl, and inside it, change the palyer x and y to where the armdyl boss is.

Read full topic
item.source: Help on making a teleport command

item.title: Help on making a teleport command
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

you need the case ID too.
For example,

case 168: if (teleblock == true) { // Enjoy sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("COMMAND HERE"); } break;

Read full topic
